node.title: Remutaka and Haast highway closures planned
node.description: Major roads connecting Wellington and the Wairarapa, as well as the one connecting the West Coast and Wanaka will close for road works.
node.content:
["Major roads connecting Wellington and the Wairarapa, as well as the one connecting the West Coast and Wanaka will close for road works.", "", "
The Remutaka Hill road. Both the Haast Pass and the Remutaka Hill road are expected to be closed for work. Photo: 123rf
", "State Highway 2 over the Remutaka Hill will be closed for five nights from tonight so maintenance work and continue. The road connects Wairarapa to the rest of the Wellington Region.", "Waka Kotahi said the closures are needed to allow essential work to be done safely.", "The road will shut at 9pm each evening and reopen at 4 the next morning.", "A service is available for light vehicles to escort shift workers and those who must cross the hill for essential purposes, but must be booked ahead.", "", "
The Haast Pass road. Photo: RG41
", "Haast Pass on the South Island's West Coast is scheduled to be closed overnight from Monday into Tuesday.", "The road connects the West Coast and Otago regions, and will shut from 10pm Monday evening until 7am Tuesday, so work on the Ultra-Fast Broadband Southern Fibre Link project can be completed.", "Waka Kotahi said if the weather does not allow the work to be done on Monday, the closure will be moved to Tuesday night instead.", "It will affect all freight trips and drivers who use State Highway 6 between Otago and Westland - but emergency vehicles will be accommodated.", "The highway will be closed near the Gates of Haast Bridge, but signs will advertise the closure at Haast, Makarora and south of Hokitika."]
